Sentencas: Mechanical reliability is a critical parameter for both the assembling and long-term operation of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Characterisation of Ni-cermets SOFCs with varying anode densities

Sentencas: The mechanical robustness of the SOFCs depends critically on the strength of the anode substrate.
Titulo: Characterisation of Ni-cermets SOFCs with varying anode densities

Sentencas: To enhance the mechanical strength, the density of the anode substrate was increased.
Titulo: Characterisation of Ni-cermets SOFCs with varying anode densities

Sentencas: Three variations were chosen in addition to the standard-type SOFCs (4.7 g cm(-3)): +5% (4.9 g cm(-3)),+ 10% (5.1 g cm(-3)) and +15% (5.3 g cm(-3)).
Titulo: Characterisation of Ni-cermets SOFCs with varying anode densities

Sentencas: These SOFCs were characterised with respect to their bending strength, transport parameters, and electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Characterisation of Ni-cermets SOFCs with varying anode densities

Sentencas: The experimental results showed that the mechanical strength of the anodes can be improved.
Titulo: Characterisation of Ni-cermets SOFCs with varying anode densities

Sentencas: The electrochemical performance was not detrimentally influenced.
Titulo: Characterisation of Ni-cermets SOFCs with varying anode densities
